text: Ia gumazir kam inigh deraghvɨra an akurvaghtɨ, gumazir aremezir kamɨn anababa, an arazim ikarvaghan markɨ. Ia an akuragh ua nguibar ekiar gumazamiziba arɨ mangɨ mongamimɨn anetɨgh. Eghtɨ a kagh ikɨ mangɨtɨ ofa gamir gumazir me faragha Godɨn ingangarim bagha mɨsevegha borem a gingezim aremeghtɨ, a gɨn mongamin nguibar ekiar kam ategh uan nguibamɨn mangam.
